meanings.definition: To place a bet before the start of a round of gambling.
meanings.sent1: Before the game began, he was anteing confidently.
meanings.sent2: Players often enjoy anteing up before the poker game.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be anteing its treats in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The sun anteing its rays over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: She anteing her hopes on a lucky hand.

meanings.definition: The act of placing a bet before the start of a round of gambling.
meanings.sent1: The anteing at the table added to the excitement.
meanings.sent2: His anteing was a regular part of the game night.
meanings.sent3: The anteing of snacks for the party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: The anteing of coins in the jar symbolized good luck.
meanings.sent5: Her anteing of tokens showed her enthusiasm for the game.
